authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params.description: params defines the x/mint parameters to update. NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type. Since: cosmos-sdk 0.47

inflationRateChange.description: maximum annual change in inflation rate

cosmos.mint.v1beta1.Params.title: Params
cosmos.mint.v1beta1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the x/mint module.
